text: Lier is a municipality in Buskerud county, Norway. In 2023, 28,167 people lived there. Settlements in the municipality include Askgrenda, Fagerliåsen/Poverudbyen, Frydenlund, Gullaug, Huseby (Lier), Kjellstad, Kjenner, Lahell, Lierbyen,https://www.nettavisen.no/okonomi/carboline- kutter-28-av-55-ansatte-falt-a-se/s/5-95-2429185. Retrieved 2025-05-13 Lierskogen, Lierstranda, Nordal, Nøste, Oddevall/Sjåstad, Stoppen, Sylling, and Tranby (Lier). == Related pages == * List of mayors in Norway that are elected until 2027 Category:Municipalities of Buskerud
title: Lier, Norway
